name: Bydlo (handsome and smart cat)
description:
Bydlo (handsome and smart cat)
Game about my cat.

WASD - to move
LMB - to take a photo

Plot: Take pictures of the cute cat, and then something unexpected happens.

To take a photo, you need to get as close to the cat as possible and aim the camera at it until a photo frame appears on the screen. Then, take the photo with the left mouse button.

Made with Unity.
